00015 #ifndef LED_H_
00016 #define LED_H_
00017 
00018 #define NUM_LEDS        3
00019 
00020 #ifndef PLATFORM_LINUX
00021 
00022 #include "mos.h"
00023 
00024 /* Specify the port, data direction register and pin mask. */
00025 #ifdef ARCH_AVR
00026 #define LED_PORT PORTA
00027 #define LED_DIR DDRA
00028 #define LED_MASK 0x07
00029 
00030 #define LED_ON(led) LED_PORT &= ~(1<<led)
00031 #define LED_OFF(led) LED_PORT |= (1<<led)
00032 #define LED_DISP(val) LED_PORT = ~val
00033 
00034 
00035 #elif PLATFORM_TELOSB
00036 #define LED_PORT P5OUT
00037 #define LED_DIR P5DIR
00038 #define LED_MASK ((1 << 4) | (1 << 5) | (1 << 6))
00039 
00040 #define LED_ON(led)   LED_PORT &= ~(1 << (4+led))
00041 #define LED_OFF(led)  LED_PORT |= (1 << (4+led))
00042 #define LED_DISP(val) do{                \
00043    LED_PORT |= LED_MASK;                 \
00044    LED_PORT &= ~((val << 4) & LED_MASK); \
00045   }while(0)
00046    
00047 #else
00048 #error "Undfined LEDs for this platform"
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 #define LED_INIT_HARDWARE() LED_DIR |= LED_MASK;
00052 
00053 #else
00054 
00055 #include "gevent.h"
00056 #include "node_id.h"
00057 
00058 /* Provide the same interface in XMOS.  
00059  * Changing LEDs sends an event to the simulator.
00060  */
00061 #define LED_ON(led)     do {                               \
00062       gevent_send(LED_EVENT, "ii", "%i LED_ON %x\n",       \
00063                   mos_node_id_get(), state|(1<<led));      \
00064    } while(0)
00065 
00066 #define LED_OFF(led)    do {                                \
00067       gevent_send(LED_EVENT, "ii", "%i LED_OFF %x\n",       \
00068                   mos_node_id_get(), state&~(1<<led));      \
00069    } while(0)
00070 
00071 #define LED_DISP(val)   do {                                    \
00072       gevent_send(LED_EVENT, "ii", "%i LED_DISP %x\n",          \
00073                   mos_node_id_get(), val);                      \
00074    } while(0)
00075 #endif
00076 
00078 void led_init(void);
00079 
00083 uint8_t mos_led_get_num_leds(void);
00084 
00088 void mos_led_on(uint8_t led);
00089 
00093 void mos_led_off(uint8_t led);
00094 
00098 void mos_led_toggle(uint8_t led);
00099 
00102 void mos_led_blink(uint8_t led);

00107 void mos_led_display(uint8_t display_value);

00109 #endif
